SQL.LOAD: SELECT company_id, list_item_id, new_description, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, code_mapping_id FROM elp_code_mapping WHERE code_mapping_id = :code_mapping_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT LI.list_item_id, LI.code, T.TRANSLATION description, cm.new_description, cm.code_mapping_id FROM ELP_LIST_ITEM LI, ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION T, ELP_LANGUAGE LANG, ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION T1, (select new_description, list_item_id, code_mapping_id from elp_code_mapping where company_id = :company_id) cm WHERE LI.DICT_ITEM_ID = T.DICT_ITEM_ID AND LI.DICT_ITEM_ID = T1.DICT_ITEM_ID (+) AND LANG.LANGUAGE_ID = T.LANGUAGE_ID AND LANG.CODE = 'EN' and li.list_item_id = cm.list_item_id(+) AND T1.LANGUAGE_ID = :Language_Id AND LI.LIST_ID = :List_Id ORDER BY UPPER(TRIM(T.TRANSLATION))
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_code_mapping SET company_id = :company_id, list_item_id = :list_item_id, new_description = :new_description, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE code_mapping_id = :code_mapping_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_code_mapping ( company_id, list_item_id, new_description, created_by, code_mapping_id ) VALUES ( :company_id, :list_item_id, :new_description, :created_by, :code_mapping_id )
SQL.GET_CONVERTED_CODE: select NEW_DESCRIPTION from ELP_CODE_MAPPING cm inner join elp_list_item li on li.LIST_ITEM_ID = cm.LIST_ITEM_ID inner join elp_list l on l.list_id = li.list_id where COMPANY_ID = :company_id and l.code = :list_code and li.code = :list_item_code
